title: Channel Islands National Park: Parks as Classrooms
body: Parks as Classrooms        Field Trips Bring your students to the Channel Islands. Find information about bringing your students to the park’s mainland visitor center and to the park islands. All Field Trips   Plan Your Field Trip    Field Trips Learn More     Guest Speakers Can’t get to the park’s mainland visitor center or to the park islands. If your California school is in Ventura or southern Santa Barbara counties, a park ranger can bring a program to your classroom. All Guest Speakers   Programs in your Classrooms    Guest Speakers Learn More     Curriculum Materials Bring the Channel Islands to your classroom. Review our ever-growing listing of lesson plans and curricula. All Curriculum Materials   Featured Curricula    From Shore to sea Curriculum Unit Learn More     Institutes & Field Schools NatureBridge offers single- and multi-day trips to the park islands. All Institutes & Field Schools   Field Schools    Naturebridge Learn More
